taxi.utils

Class Validators

  • java.lang.Object
    • taxi.utils.Validators

  • public class Validators
extends java.lang.Object
    The Validators class implements all the validation checks for the taxi service.
    Since:
    Academic Year 2016-2017
    Author:
    Team 4

    • Method Detail

      • validateCarModelDate

        public static boolean validateCarModelDate(java.lang.String carModelDate)
        validateCarModelDate method This method is used for validating car model production date. Receives as parameter the carModelDate of a taxi. It is assumed that a car model date has the format MM/YYYY.
        • At first step the length of the car model date is checked. It has to be 7 and not empty
        • Secondly, the date is splitted to month and year.
        • Then this date is checked whether has passed or not

        Parameters:
        carModelDate - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateCreditCard

        public static boolean validateCreditCard(java.lang.String creditCardNumber,
                                         java.lang.String expiryDate,
                                         java.lang.String ccv)
        validateCreditCard method This method is used for validating credit card. Receives as parameters all the relevant information of a credit card, except the type.
        • At the first step checks if the credit card number has 16 characters and the ccv 3 characters
        • At the second step checks that credit card number and ccv consist of numbers
        • Expiry date is represented as MM/YY. String that includes the expiry date, is splitted to month and year.
        • Then this date is checked whether has passed or not

        Parameters:
        creditCardNumber - type String
        expiryDate - type String
        ccv - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateDateOfBirth

        public static boolean validateDateOfBirth(java.util.Date DateOfBirth)
        validateDateOfBirth method This method is used for validating date of birth. Receives as parameter the date of birth of a user. Then is checked if this date is before the current date.

        Parameters:
        DateOfBirth - type Date
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateEmailCst

        public static boolean validateEmailCst(java.lang.String email)
        validateEmailCst method This method is used for validating customer's email.
        • At first creates a pattern which checks that the email has the appropriate format: user@domain.xx.
        • If the email matches that pattern, it checks if this email exists already in the table of the DB.
        • If the email does not exist, then the validation is completed successfully (true)

        Parameters:
        email - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateEmailTx

        public static boolean validateEmailTx(java.lang.String email)
        validateEmailTx method This method is used for validating taxi driver's email.
        • At first creates a pattern which checks that the email has the appropriate format: user@domain.xx.
        • If the email matches that pattern, it checks if this email exists already in the table of the DB.
        • If the email does not exist, then the validation is completed successfully (true)

        Parameters:
        email - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateLicensePlate

        public static boolean validateLicensePlate(java.lang.String licensePlate)
        validateLicensePlate method This method is used for validating taxi. Receives as parameter the license plate of a taxi. It is assumed that a license plate consists of 3 capital letters and 4 numbers.
        • At first step the length of the license plate is checked. It has to be 7 and not empty
        • Secondly, it is splitted to its letters and numbers.
        • We then assure that the letters variable has no numbers, and that the numbers variable has only numbers

        Parameters:
        licensePlate - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validatePassword

        public static boolean validatePassword(java.lang.String password)
        validatePassword method This method is used for validating password.
        • At first it creates two patterns: one for capital letters and one for numeric digits.
        • Then it checks the length of the password: It is not allowed to be empty and less than 8 characters.
        • After this, it checks if the password has at least one capital letter and one number.

        Parameters:
        password - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateTaxi

        public static boolean validateTaxi(Taxi taxi)
        validateTaxi method This method is used for validating that a taxi is not already defined. Receives as parameter the taxi object. Then a check is made within the table TaxiDriver that this object is not already defined from other driver, using the equals method

        Parameters:
        taxi - type Taxi
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateUsernameCst

        public static boolean validateUsernameCst(java.lang.String username)
        validateUsernameCst method This method is used for validating username of a customer. Searches in the appropriate table of the DB to find if another user with the same username exists. In case the username does not already exist, the validation is successful (true).

        Parameters:
        username - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not

      • validateUsernameTx

        public static boolean validateUsernameTx(java.lang.String username)
        validateUsernameTx method This method is used for validating username of a taxi driver. Searches in the appropriate table of the DB to find if another user with the same username exists. In case the username does not already exist, the validation is successful (true).

        Parameters:
        username - type String
        Returns:
        boolean true if validation is successful/false if it is not
